bibdata.title: American National Standard Dictionary for Technologies of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC), Electromagnetic Pulse (EMP), and Electrostatic Discharge (ESD)
American National Standard Dictionary for Technologies of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC), Electromagnetic Pulse (EMP), and Electrostatic Discharge (ESD)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Terms associated with electromagnetic compatibility (EMC), electromagnetic pulse (EMP), and electrostatic discharge (ESD) are defined. Quantities, units, multiplying factors, symbols, and abbreviations are covered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
